element.name: fProductID
element.sql: select ct.fid,ct.fName from CaClientProduct cp left join CoProductType ct on cp.fProductID=ct.fid where 1=1 and fclientid='{clientId}'

element.name: co.fState
element.option: 等待充值=('4'_'5'),充值成功=4,充值失败=5

listData.sql: select co.fID,CONVERT(VARCHAR(23),fCreateTime,120)fCreateTime,cp.fName,fCardNo,fPrice,fMoney,co.fState,co.fID from CaOrderQuery co left join CoProductType cp on co.fProductID=cp.fID where 1=1 and fAgentID='{agentId}' and fclientid='{clientId}'
listData.menuName: 卡订单号,下单时间,商品,卡号,面值,金额,订单状态,查看详细

deletemethod.sql: delete from CaOrder where fid in

exportData.sql: select fOrderID,fID,fMoney,CONVERT(VARCHAR(23),fCreateTime,120)fCreateTime,fCardNo,fPassword,fProductID,fState,fOverTime from CaOrderQuery where 1=1 and fAgentID='{agentId}' and fClientID='{clientId}'
exportData.menuName: 合作方取卡请求号,订单号,金额,请求时间,卡号,卡密,业务类型,充值状态,结束时间
